attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i think its about time these bank charges were stopped the banks make an estimate £2.9billion per year on these charges if you're fed up of paying between £20-£38 for things like an unpaid direct debit or overdraft sign this and lets get our money back of these banks it only costs the banks an average of £1.50p to send a automated letter most banks don't inform you when you have an unpaid direct debit.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
